original_text: The king gave a great feast for all the leaders and officers of his kingdom. He did it to give honour to Esther. He said that there would be a holiday for people in all the regions. He also gave expensive gifts to people.
korean_text: 왕이 크게 잔치를 베푸니 이는 에스더를 위한 잔치라 모든 지방관과 신하들을 위하여 잔치를 베풀고 또 각 지방의 세금을 면제하고 왕의 이름으로 큰 상을 주니라

sentences.original_text: The king gave a great feast
for all the leaders and officers
He did it to give honour to Esther
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 에스더에게 영광을 주기 위해 그렇게 했다

sentences.original_text: He said that there would be a holiday
for people in all the regions
